name: Product Ingredients 10
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign content_max_width = section.settings.content_max_width
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  
  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign use_tabs = section.settings.use_tabs 
  assign active_tabs = section.settings.active_tabs
  assign tabs_gap = section.settings.tabs_gap
  assign tabs_gap_mobile = section.settings.tabs_gap_mobile
  assign tabs_bg_color = section.settings.tabs_bg_color
  assign tabs_border_thickness = section.settings.tabs_border_thickness
  assign tabs_border_color = section.settings.tabs_border_color
  assign tabs_radius = section.settings.tabs_radius

  assign first_tab = section.settings.first_tab
  assign second_tab = section.settings.second_tab
  assign tab_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal
  assign tab_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tab_padding_vertical = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical
  assign tab_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tab_bg_color = section.settings.tab_bg_color
  assign tab_bg_hover_color = section.settings.tab_bg_hover_color
  assign tab_bg_active_color = section.settings.tab_bg_active_color
  assign tab_border_thickness = section.settings.tab_border_thickness
  assign tab_border_color = section.settings.tab_border_color
  assign tab_border_hover_color = section.settings.tab_border_hover_color
  assign tab_border_active_color = section.settings.tab_border_active_color
  assign tab_radius = section.settings.tab_radius
  assign tab_custom = section.settings.tab_custom
  assign tab_font = section.settings.tab_font
  assign tab_size = section.settings.tab_size
  assign tab_size_mobile = section.settings.tab_size_mobile
  assign tab_height = section.settings.tab_height
  assign tab_color = section.settings.tab_color
  assign tab_hover_color = section.settings.tab_hover_color
  assign tab_active_color = section.settings.tab_active_color

  assign cards_layout = section.settings.cards_layout
  assign cards_layout_mobile = section.settings.cards_layout_mobile
  assign cards_per_row = section.settings.cards_per_row  
  assign cards_per_row_mobile = section.settings.cards_per_row_mobile  
  assign cards_slider_per_row = section.settings.cards_slider_per_row  
  assign cards_slider_per_row_mobile = section.settings.cards_slider_per_row_mobile 
  assign cards_border_thickness = section.settings.cards_border_thickness
  assign cards_radius = section.settings.cards_radius
  assign cards_border_color = section.settings.cards_border_color
  assign cards_border_color_hover = section.settings.cards_border_color_hover
  assign cards_bg_color = section.settings.cards_bg_color

  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile    
  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile


  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign open_new_tab = section.settings.open_new_tab
  assign image_hover_type = section.settings.image_hover_type

  assign product_content_align = section.settings.product_content_align
  assign product_content_align_mobile = section.settings.product_content_align_mobile

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile
  
  assign modal_title_custom = section.settings.modal_title_custom
  assign modal_title_font = section.settings.modal_title_font
  assign modal_title_size = section.settings.modal_title_size
  assign modal_title_size_mobile = section.settings.modal_title_size_mobile
  assign modal_title_height = section.settings.modal_title_height
  assign modal_title_color = section.settings.modal_title_color
  assign modal_title_mt = section.settings.modal_title_mt
  assign modal_title_mt_mobile = section.settings.modal_title_mt_mobile

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign arrow_mt = section.settings.arrow_mt
  assign arrow_mt_mobile = section.settings.arrow_mt_mobile
  assign arrow_gap = section.settings.arrow_gap
  assign arrow_gap_mobile = section.settings.arrow_gap_mobile
  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign close_size = section.settings.close_size
  assign close_size_mobile = section.settings.close_size_mobile
  assign close_color = section.settings.close_color
  assign close_hover_color = section.settings.close_hover_color
  
  assign use_modal = section.settings.use_modal
  assign modal_overlay = section.settings.modal_overlay
  assign modal_overlay_color = section.settings.modal_overlay_color
  assign modal_icon_color = section.settings.modal_icon_color
    
  assign modal_inner_width = section.settings.modal_inner_width
  assign modal_inner_padding_horizontal = section.settings.modal_inner_padding_horizontal
  assign modal_inner_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.modal_inner_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign modal_inner_padding_vertical = section.settings.modal_inner_padding_vertical
  assign modal_inner_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.modal_inner_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign modal_inner_bg_color = section.settings.modal_inner_bg_color
  assign modal_inner_radius = section.settings.modal_inner_radius

  assign first_tab_count = 0
  assign second_tab_count = 0

  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'ingredient'
      if block.settings.tab == 'first'
        assign first_tab_count = first_tab_count | plus: 1
      endif
    endif
  endfor

  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'ingredient'
      if block.settings.tab == 'second'
        assign second_tab_count = second_tab_count | plus: 1
      endif
    endif
  endfor

  assign loading_attribute = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign loading_attribute = 'eager'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .product-ingredients-top-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ tabs_gap_mobile }}px;
    padding: 8px;
    border: {{ tabs_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tabs_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tabs_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tabs_bg_color }};
    max-width: fit-content;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tab-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tab_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_color }};
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
    font-weight: 400;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tab-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_hover_color }};
    color: {{ tab_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tab-{{ section.id }}.active {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_active_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_active_color }};
    color: {{ tab_active_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .product-ingredients-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: 0px 16px 16px 16px;
  }

  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: auto !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    border: {{ cards_border_thickness }}px solid {{ cards_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ cards_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ cards_bg_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: border-color 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {
    background-color: transparent;
  }
  
  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} a,
  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} div.js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }},
  .product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }} {
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}:not(a):not(.js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}) {
    cursor: default;
  }
  
  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}:not(a):not(.js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}) > .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }} {
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  

  .product-ingredients-modal-card-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
    border: 0px !important;
    border-radius: 0px !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-card-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border-color: {{ cards_border_color_hover }};
  }

  .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px auto;
    max-width: 70%;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    top: 10px;
    right: 10px;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background: transparent !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    color: {{ modal_icon_color }};
  }

  .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-image-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: 70%;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
   
  .product-ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    margin-top: {{ modal_title_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ modal_title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ modal_title_height }}%;
    color: {{ modal_title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .product-ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ product_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .product-ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;    
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }
  .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }},
  .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btns-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-top: 40px;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 5%;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 5%;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0;
  }

  {% if use_tabs %}
    @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-desktop {
        display: grid !important;
        grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row }}, 1fr);
        gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
      }
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-desktop {
        display: block !important;
      }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-mobile {
        display: grid !important;
        grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row_mobile }}, 1fr);
        gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
      }
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }}.active-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-mobile {
        display: block !important;
      }
    }
  {% else %}
     @media screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-desktop {
        display: grid !important;
        grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row }}, 1fr);
        gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
      }
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-desktop {
        display: block !important;
      }
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 1023px) {
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }}.layout-grid-mobile {
        display: grid !important;
        grid-template-columns: repeat({{ cards_per_row_mobile }}, 1fr);
        gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
      }
      .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }}.layout-slider-mobile {
        display: block !important;
      }
    }
  {% endif %}

  
  .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 20px;
    right: 20px;
    cursor: pointer;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    height: {{ close_size_mobile }}px;
    width: {{ close_size_mobile }}px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }} img,
  .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    stroke: {{ close_color }};    
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    stroke: {{ close_hover_color }};
  }
  
  
  .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100vh;
    z-index: -1;
    display: none;
    gap: 20px;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: 15px;
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    background-color: {{ modal_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: modal_overlay }};
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    cursor: default;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex;
    z-index: 9999;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}.active-visible {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 90%;
    position: relative;
    padding: {{ modal_inner_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ modal_inner_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    background-color: {{ modal_inner_bg_color }};
    border-radius: {{ modal_inner_radius }}px;
    max-height: 100%;
    overflow-y: auto;
    scrollbar-width: none;
    cursor: default;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}::-webkit-scrollbar {
    display: none;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-desktop-{{ section.id }},
  .product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
  }

  .product-ingredients-modal-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 10px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .product-ingredients-top-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }
    
    .product-ingredients-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ tabs_gap }}px;    
    }

    .product-ingredients-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal }}px;    
      font-size: {{ tab_size }}px;
    }
    
    .product-ingredients-title-{{ section.id }} {    
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px !important;
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-modal-title-{{ section.id }} {    
      margin-top: {{ modal_title_mt }}px !important;
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ modal_title_size }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt}}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
    }

    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }
    
    .product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ close_size }}px;
      width: {{ close_size }}px;
    }


    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ modal_inner_width }}px;
      padding: {{ modal_inner_padding_vertical }}px {{ modal_inner_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ product_content_align }};
    }

    .product-ingredients-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-desktop-{{ section.id }},
    .product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
    }

    .product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-direction: row;
    }

    .product-ingredients-modal-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}

{% endif %}

{% if image_hover_type == "zoom" %}

      transform: translateZ(0);
      transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
    }

    .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} img,
    .product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
      transform: scale(1.1) translateZ(0);
      transition: transform 1.2s cubic-bezier(.4,0,0,1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-{{ section.id }}" {% if background_style == 'solid' %}style="background-color:{{ background_color }};"{% else %} style="background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"{% endif %}>

            data-view="{{ cards_slider_per_row }}"
            data-view-mobile="{{ cards_slider_per_row_mobile }}">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                {% if block.type == 'ingredient' %}
                  {% if block.settings.tab == 'second' %}
                    <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.url == blank %}js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}{% endif %} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                      <div class="product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                          {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                          {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                            loading: loading_attribute,
                            width: block.settings.image.width,
                            height: block.settings.image.height,
                            sizes: sizes,
                            widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                          }}
                        {% else %}
                          {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        {% endif %}
                        {% if use_modal %}
                          <div class="product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }}">
                            <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none">
                              <path d="M10 10.8334V12.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                              <path d="M10.0013 8.33341C10.4615 8.33341 10.8346 7.96032 10.8346 7.50008C10.8346 7.03984 10.4615 6.66675 10.0013 6.66675C9.54106 6.66675 9.16797 7.03984 9.16797 7.50008C9.16797 7.96032 9.54106 8.33341 10.0013 8.33341Z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                              <path d="M9.9987 16.0416C13.3354 16.0416 16.0404 13.3366 16.0404 9.99992C16.0404 6.6632 13.3354 3.95825 9.9987 3.95825C6.66198 3.95825 3.95703 6.6632 3.95703 9.99992C3.95703 13.3366 6.66198 16.0416 9.9987 16.0416Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                            </svg>
                          </div>  
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                      <div class="product-ingredients-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                          <p class="product-ingredients-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                  {% endif %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
            <div class="product-ingredients-btns-{{ section.id }}">
              <button class="product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                <span class="animate-icon"></span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                <span class="animate-icon"></span>
              </button>
            </div>  
          </div>
        </div>
      {% else %}
        <div class="product-ingredients-tab-content-{{ section.id }} active-content-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="product-ingredients-grid-{{ section.id }} {% if desktop_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'grid' %}layout-grid-mobile{% endif %}">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              {% if block.type == 'ingredient' %}              
                <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.url == blank %}js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}" id="{{ block.id }}">
                  <div class="product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                      {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                      {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                        loading: loading_attribute,
                        width: block.settings.image.width,
                        height: block.settings.image.height,
                        sizes: sizes,
                        widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                      }}
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if use_modal %}
                    <div class="product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }}">
                      <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none">
                        <path d="M10 10.8334V12.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                        <path d="M10.0013 8.33341C10.4615 8.33341 10.8346 7.96032 10.8346 7.50008C10.8346 7.03984 10.4615 6.66675 10.0013 6.66675C9.54106 6.66675 9.16797 7.03984 9.16797 7.50008C9.16797 7.96032 9.54106 8.33341 10.0013 8.33341Z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                        <path d="M9.9987 16.0416C13.3354 16.0416 16.0404 13.3366 16.0404 9.99992C16.0404 6.6632 13.3354 3.95825 9.9987 3.95825C6.66198 3.95825 3.95703 6.6632 3.95703 9.99992C3.95703 13.3366 6.66198 16.0416 9.9987 16.0416Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                      </svg>
                    </div>  
                  {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="product-ingredients-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                      <p class="product-ingredients-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>          
              {% endif %}
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
          <div class="product-ingredients-slider-second-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper {% if desktop_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-desktop{% endif %} {% if mobile_layout == 'slider' %}layout-slider-mobile{% endif %}"
            data-gap="{{ cards_gap }}"
            data-gap-mobile="{{ cards_gap_mobile }}"
            data-view="{{ cards_slider_per_row }}"
            data-view-mobile="{{ cards_slider_per_row_mobile }}">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                {% if block.type == 'ingredient' %}                
                  <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" {% if open_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %}{% else %}div{% endif %} class="product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} {% if block.settings.url == blank %}js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}{% endif %} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                    <div class="product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                        {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                        {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                          loading: loading_attribute,
                          width: block.settings.image.width,
                          height: block.settings.image.height,
                          sizes: sizes,
                          widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                        }}
                      {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if use_modal %}
                        <div class="product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }}">
                          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none">
                            <path d="M10 10.8334V12.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                            <path d="M10.0013 8.33341C10.4615 8.33341 10.8346 7.96032 10.8346 7.50008C10.8346 7.03984 10.4615 6.66675 10.0013 6.66675C9.54106 6.66675 9.16797 7.03984 9.16797 7.50008C9.16797 7.96032 9.54106 8.33341 10.0013 8.33341Z" fill="currentColor"></path>
                            <path d="M9.9987 16.0416C13.3354 16.0416 16.0404 13.3366 16.0404 9.99992C16.0404 6.6632 13.3354 3.95825 9.9987 3.95825C6.66198 3.95825 3.95703 6.6632 3.95703 9.99992C3.95703 13.3366 6.66198 16.0416 9.9987 16.0416Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
                          </svg>
                        </div>  
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                    <div class="product-ingredients-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                        <p class="product-ingredients-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>               
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
            <div class="product-ingredients-btns-{{ section.id }}">
              <button class="product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
                <span class="animate-icon"></span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
                <span class="animate-icon"></span>
              </button>
            </div>  
          </div>
        </div>
      {% endif %}

    </div>
</div>

<div class="product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}">
  <button class="product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
    <span class="animate-icon"></span>
  </button>
       
  <div class="product-ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}">
    <div class="product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }}">
      <svg width="12" height="12" viewBox="0 0 12 12" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <path d="M10.5812 10.8566L5.79062 6.06601M5.79062 6.06601L1 1.27539M5.79062 6.06601L10.5812 1.27539M5.79062 6.06601L1 10.8566" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.36922" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
      </svg>
    </div>  

    {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% if block.type == 'ingredient' %}
        <div class="product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-card-{{ section.id }}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
          <div class="product-ingredients-image-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-image-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
              {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
              {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                loading: loading_attribute,
                width: block.settings.image.width,
                height: block.settings.image.height,
                sizes: sizes,
                widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
              }}
            {% else %}
              {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
            {% endif %}
          </div>
          <div class="product-ingredients-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
            {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
              <p class="product-ingredients-modal-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
              <div class="product-ingredients-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>

  <button class="product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
    <span class="animate-icon"></span>
  </button>

  <div class="product-ingredients-modal-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
     <button class="product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}" style="display: flex !important;">
      <span class="animate-icon"></span>
    </button>
    <button class="product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }} product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}" style="display: flex !important;">
      <span class="animate-icon"></span>
    </button>
  </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>


<script>
  function initProductIngredients() {

    const swiperSelectors = [
      '.product-ingredients-slider-first-{{ section.id }}',
      '.product-ingredients-slider-second-{{ section.id }}'
    ];

    swiperSelectors.forEach(selector => {
      const element = document.querySelector(selector);
      if (element) {
        new Swiper(selector, {
          speed: 300,
          loop: true,
          centeredSlides: true,
          navigation: {
            nextEl: '.product-ingredients-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
            prevEl: '.product-ingredients-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
          },
          breakpoints: {
            320: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gapMobile || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.viewMobile || 1),
            },
            768: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gap || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.view || 3),
            },
            1024: {
              spaceBetween: parseInt(element.dataset.gap || 0),
              slidesPerView: parseFloat(element.dataset.view || 3),
            }
          }
        });
      }
    });

    const firstTab = document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-first-tab-{{ section.id }}');
    const secondTab = document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-second-tab-{{ section.id }}');

    function switchTabToFirst() {
      secondTab.classList.remove('active');
      firstTab.classList.add('active');

      document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
      document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.add('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
    }

    function switchTabToSecond() {
      secondTab.classList.add('active');
      firstTab.classList.remove('active');

      document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.add('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
      document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('active-content-{{ section.id }}');
    }

    if (firstTab) {
      firstTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToFirst);
    }

    if (secondTab) {
      secondTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToSecond);
    }

    {% if use_modal %}
    const modalButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-modal-button-{{ section.id }}');
    const clickableCards = document.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}.js-modal-trigger-{{ section.id }}');
    const modal = document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-modal-{{ section.id }}');
    const modalClose = document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-modal-close-{{ section.id }}');
    const modalCards = document.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-modal-card-{{ section.id }}');
    
    function openModalFromCard(cardElement) {
      const cardId = cardElement ? cardElement.id : null;
      
      if (cardId) {
        modalCards.forEach(card => card.classList.remove('active'));
        
        const targetModalCard = Array.from(modalCards).find(card => card.dataset.id === cardId);
        
        if (targetModalCard) {
          targetModalCard.classList.add('active');
        }
        
        modal.classList.add('active');
        setTimeout(() => {
          modal.classList.add('active-visible');
        }, 10);
        
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
      }
    }

    modalButtons.forEach(button => {
      button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        e.stopPropagation();
        const parentCard = this.closest('.product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}');
        openModalFromCard(parentCard);
      });
    });

    clickableCards.forEach(card => {
      card.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        openModalFromCard(this);
      });
    });

    function closeModal() {
      modal.classList.remove('active-visible');
      setTimeout(() => {
        modal.classList.remove('active');
        modalCards.forEach(card => card.classList.remove('active'));
      }, 300);
      document.body.style.overflow = '';
    }

    const modalBtnPrev = document.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-modal-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}');
    const modalBtnNext = document.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-modal-btn-next-{{ section.id }}');

    function getActiveTabCards() {
      {% if use_tabs %}
      const activeTab = document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-first-tab-{{ section.id }}.active') 
        ? 'first' 
        : 'second';
      
      const activeTabContent = activeTab === 'first' 
        ? document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-first-tab-content-{{ section.id }}')
        : document.querySelector('.product-ingredients-second-tab-content-{{ section.id }}');
      
      if (!activeTabContent) return Array.from(modalCards);
      
      const activeCardIds = Array.from(activeTabContent.querySelectorAll('.product-ingredients-card-{{ section.id }}')).map(card => card.id);
      
      return Array.from(modalCards).filter(modalCard => activeCardIds.includes(modalCard.dataset.id));
      {% else %}
      return Array.from(modalCards);
      {% endif %}
    }

    function getActiveCardIndex() {
      const tabCards = getActiveTabCards();
      return tabCards.findIndex(card => card.classList.contains('active'));
    }

    function showCardByIndex(index) {
      const tabCards = getActiveTabCards();
      modalCards.forEach(card => card.classList.remove('active'));
      if (tabCards[index]) {
        tabCards[index].classList.add('active');
        modal.querySelector('.product-ingredients-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}').scrollTop = 0;
      }
    }

    if (modalBtnPrev) {
      modalBtnPrev.forEach(prev => {
        prev.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
          e.stopPropagation();
          const tabCards = getActiveTabCards();
          const currentIndex = getActiveCardIndex();
          if (currentIndex > 0) {
            showCardByIndex(currentIndex - 1);
          } else {
            showCardByIndex(tabCards.length - 1); 
          }
        });
      })      
    }

    if (modalBtnNext) {
      modalBtnNext.forEach(next => {
        next.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
          e.stopPropagation();
          const tabCards = getActiveTabCards();
          const currentIndex = getActiveCardIndex();
          if (currentIndex < tabCards.length - 1) {
            showCardByIndex(currentIndex + 1);
          } else {
            showCardByIndex(0); 
          }
        });
      });     
    }

    if (modalClose) {
      modalClose.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
    }

    if (modal) {
      modal.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (e.target === this) {
          closeModal();
        }
      });
    }

    document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
      if (e.key === 'Escape' && modal.classList.contains('active')) {
        closeModal();
      }
    });
    {% endif %}
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProductIngredients);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initProductIngredients);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initProductIngredients);
  }
</script>
